[Elven Fighter Class Transfer]:
An Elven Fighter who has reached level 20 may change their class to an Elven Knight or an Elven Scout. A character may undertake the class transfer quest at level 18; if successful, they will be able to use more specialized and powerful skills than before. In order to become an Elven Knight, you must first meet Master Sorius, and in order to become an Elven Scout, you must first meet Master Reisa. They can both be found in the Town of Gludio. Think carefully about which class you want to select, then seek out the appropriate NPC.
Close Window.
